title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 562.8 - Abandoned vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 562.8 - Abandoned vehicles

State Regulations

Abandoned vehicles will be dealt with by the university
police department and disposed of according to the New York State Vehicle and

Traffic Law, section 1224. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
562.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
